text.section: The motor fuel tax does not apply to motor fuel that is exported or sold for exportation from this State.

The motor fuel tax does not apply to special fuel:
containing dye and sold for uses other than in a licensed motor vehicle;
delivered into a tank used only for heating; or
used for any purpose other than propelling a motor vehicle or turbine-powered aircraft.
The motor fuel tax does not apply to motor fuel that is bought by the Department of General Services for use by State agencies.
